thread.title: In Third Week, Trump’s Governing Style Runs into Hurdles - WSJ
thread.title_full: In Third Week, Trump’s Governing Style Runs into Hurdles - WSJ

author: Michael C. Bender
title: In Third Week, Trump’s Governing Style Runs into Hurdles - WSJ
text:
Politics In Third Week, Trump’s Governing Style Runs into Hurdles Travel-ban ruling and moves by some Republicans to distance themselves from White House show limits of new president’s no-holds-barred approach By @reidepstein Feb. 10, 2017 7:21 p.m. ET 
WASHINGTON—President Donald Trump had the television on Thursday night when an appeals court ruled his travel ban would remain on hiatus. He first turned to Twitter and vowed in all capital letters to appeal. Then he headed toward the press office just a few steps from the Oval Office. 
Dressed in a dark suit with a blue and white tie pushed tightly up to the top button, Mr. Trump vowed to keep fighting in court. Asked if he had... To Read the Full Story, Subscribe or Sign In Most Popular Videos
